description: Details of pedestrian access pursuant to condition 22 of planning permission ref: 17669/7 dated 12th August 2004 for a mixed use development comprising the retention of 5,635 sq m of existing office accommodation in Bromyard House; the change of use and conversion of the remainder of Bromyard House and roof addition to form 478 residential units (52 x studio apartments, 180 x one bed apartments, 239 x 2 bed apartments, 7 x 3 bed apartments) and 15 live/work units; the erection of three 3 storey buildings forming 27 residential units (27 x 2 bed apartments); the erection of a 3 storey building forming 21 residential units (21 x 3 bed apartments); served by 380 parking spaces (330 residential and 50 office); erection of 4,659 sq m office building, served by 71 car parking spaces; landscaping and associated works
